title: Tudor, TotalEnergies, Uno-X Land Tour de France Wild Cards; Pidcock’s Q36.5 Team Gets Giro Wild Card
content:
Q36.5 and Tom Pidcock land Giro d'Italia bid as UCI expands grand tour fields to 23 squads for 2025 to give teams and races more flexibility.

Read the full article at Tudor, TotalEnergies, Uno-X Land Tour de France Wild Cards; Pidcock’s Q36.5 Team Gets Giro Wild Card on Velo.
author: ahood
